author: Lucas Matney
title: Peloton launches an Android TV app
description: With gyms across the country closed for business, at-home exercise companies like Peloton have found an unexpected opportunity. As the connected fitness company looks to onboard new customers, they’re also expanding platform support, announcing today that the…
